description: This file contains unit tests for the 'Team' and 'Agent' classes, specifically testing the integration of shared models and tools within a team setup. It uses pytest fixtures and mocking to verify that the correct tools are invoked during team operations.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent with a specific role and tools, capable of performing tasks.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for OpenAI chat-based models used as shared models in tests.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents with a specific mode, capable of running tasks.

methods.name: shared_model
methods.description: Fixture that creates and returns an OpenAIChat model instance.

methods.name: web_agent
methods.description: Fixture that creates a web agent with DuckDuckGoTools.

methods.name: finance_agent
methods.description: Fixture that creates a finance agent with YFinanceTools.

methods.name: analysis_agent
methods.description: Fixture that creates an analysis agent.

methods.name: route_team
methods.description: Fixture that creates a team with web, finance, and analysis agents.

methods.name: test_tools_available_to_agents
methods.description: Test function that verifies the tools passed to the invoke method during team runs.
